column3: â€œI found the taste just as previously commented: coffee, cheese, pine. The smoke was smooth but that has more to do with the cure than the strain. The effect, however, is what made gorilla biscuit a standout strain to me. As noted the name gorilla biscuit comes from the slang term for quaaludes. I've only taken quaaludes twice in my life, smoking this strain wasn't like that, but it reminded me of it. Smoking gorilla ...â€
â€œvery nice strain.does what it says.smell and taste likes coffee, with a hint of pine and skunk..couch lock, strong, feel it with 1 hit..â€

â€œGot this for sleep, for sure works. You feel floaty, very high, happy and tired! Negatives dry mouth, and makes you super hungry which is difficult when you want to sleep... better planning next timeğŸ•â€
